title: 117 - A Tribute To Grizzly 168
description: On today's show, the guys shoot the breeze and check in with everybody to see where they're at before hopping into a loaded Pod FOD that includes researchers at Yellowstone finding Grizzly 168, the oldest known Grizzly Bear, they chat about the spectacle that is going to be Kong vs. Godzilla and see why Tony is shaking in his boots a little bit at the sheer stature of Kong, they throw out some plot points that they would like to see in the new Harry Potter HBO Max series, Mitt looks for a few new movie recommendations, Zito and Digs go at each other over the biggest dinosaur bones ever being found (allegedly), Bad Bunny makes an appearance, plus much, much more. Don't forget to send in your questions and submissions to be featured on The Pod FOD @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram, and if you want to watch the whole shows and you haven't already, subscribe to Youtube.com/ThePatMcAfeeShow and become a member of McAfee's Mafia. We appreciate you all, we'll see you on Friday.
dc:creator: The Pod
